org.qteam.tinyicon

Class IconUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qteam.tinyicon.IconUtils

  • public final class IconUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods used by TinyIcon class.

    • Method Detail

      • read_byte

        public static int read_byte(byte[] buf,
                            int ofs)
        Reads a byte from the passed buffer and at the given offset.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer that contains the icon data.
        ofs - The offset in the buffer where start to read.
        Returns:
        an unsigned byte.

      • read_word_le

        public static int read_word_le(byte[] buf,
                               int ofs)
        Reads two bytes from the passed buffer and at the given offset.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer that contains the icon data.
        ofs - The offset in the buffer where start to read.
        Returns:
        a little-endian unsigned word (2 bytes).

      • read_dword_le

        public static int read_dword_le(byte[] buf,
                                int ofs)
        Reads four bytes from the passed buffer and at the given offset.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer that contains the icon data.
        ofs - The offset in the buffer where start to read.
        Returns:
        a little-endian unsigned dword (4 bytes).

        Returns:
        the padded value.

      • imgToPngBytes

        public static byte[] imgToPngBytes(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
        Converts the given BufferedImage to a byte array containing png data.
        Parameters:
        img - the BufferedImage to be converted.
        Returns:
        the png data or null if an error occurs.

      • MAKE_ARGB

        public static int MAKE_ARGB(int a,
                            int r,
                            int g,
                            int b)
        Merges the ARGB components into a single integer.
        Parameters:
        a - Alpha value.
        r - Red value.
        g - Green value.
        b - Blue value.
        Returns:
        the final color.

      • MAKE_RGB

        public static int MAKE_RGB(int r,
                           int g,
                           int b)
        Merges the RGB components into a single integer (Alpha component is 0).
        Parameters:
        r - Red value.
        g - Green value.
        b - Blue value.
        Returns:
        the final color.

      • isURL

        public static boolean isURL(java.lang.String arg)
        Tries to detect if the given argument is a local file or an URL.
        Note that, in case of URLs, this method only does a basic protocol check; it doesn't test if the URL is valid.
        Accepted protocols are: https, http and ftp.
        Parameters:
        arg - the argument to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the specified argument is an URL, false otherwise.
